Entry.JapaneseText: <Variable:140>このチュートリアルは 操作モードが<Color:140>セミオート<Color:40>のものです
Entry.EnglishText: Note: The following tutorial is for <Color:140>Semi-Auto<Color:40> control mode.

Entry.JapaneseText: 【<Color:140><Variable:140>移動<Color:40><Variable:240>】
Entry.EnglishText: [<Color:140>Movement<Color:40>]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Icon:D06><Variable:140>でキャラクターを移動させましょう 押し続けると<Variable:240>、<Variable:140>その方向へ移動します
Entry.EnglishText: Hold <Variable:140><Icon:D06><Variable:240> in a given direction to move the character you're controlling.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Control:240><Variable:140>を押しながら<Icon:C06>で キャラクターをジャンプさせましょう 移動中に行うとその方向へ跳びます
Entry.EnglishText: Press <Control:240> while pressing <Variable:140><Icon:C06><Variable:240> to jump. If you're moving, you'll jump in that direction.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Color:340><Variable:140>練習してみましょう<Color:40> <Variable:240>（<Icon:D06><Variable:140>で前後に移動 <Variable:240> <Control:240>＋<Icon:C06><Variable:140>でジャンプ<Variable:240>）
Entry.EnglishText: <Color:340>Try it for yourself!<Color:40> - Use <Icon:D06> to move around. - Press <Control:240>＋<Icon:C06> to jump.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Icon:406><Variable:140>でキャラクターを移動させましょう <Icon:406>を倒した方向へ<Variable:240>、<Variable:140>自由に進めます
Entry.EnglishText: Use <Icon:406> to move. You can move freely in whichever direction <Icon:406> is pushed.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Color:340><Variable:140>練習してみましょう<Color:40> <Variable:240>（<Icon:406><Variable:140>で自由に移動<Variable:240>）
Entry.EnglishText: <Color:340>Try it for yourself!<Color:40> - Use <Icon:406> to free run.

Entry.JapaneseText: 【<Color:140><Variable:140>ターゲットの変更<Color:40><Variable:240>】
Entry.EnglishText: [<Color:140>Switching Targets<Color:40>]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Variable:140>敵が複数いる場合 <Control:540>で最も近くの敵に ターゲットを変更します
Entry.EnglishText: When multiple enemies are present, you can press <Control:540> to switch your target to the closest enemy.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Variable:140>また<Control:540>を押しながら <Icon:D06>で自由にターゲットを選択できます
Entry.EnglishText: You can press <Icon:D06> while holding <Control:540> to switch freely between target.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Color:340><Variable:140>練習してみましょう<Color:40> <Variable:240>（<Control:540><Variable:140>でターゲット変更<Variable:240>）
Entry.EnglishText: <Color:340>Try it for yourself!<Color:40> - Press <Control:540> to switch targets.

Entry.JapaneseText: 【<Color:140><Variable:140>通常攻撃<Color:40><Variable:240>】
Entry.EnglishText: [<Color:140>Regular Attacks<Color:40>]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Control:40><Variable:140>で敵を攻撃しましょう <Icon:E06><Variable:240>＋<Control:40><Variable:140>で<Variable:240>、<Variable:140>攻撃が変化します 続けて押す事で<Variable:240>、<Variable:140>連続攻撃になります
Entry.EnglishText: Press <Control:40> to attack an enemy. Different attacks can be performed using <Icon:E06> + <Control:40>. Press repeatedly to perform combos.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Color:340><Variable:140>練習してみましょう<Color:40> <Variable:240>（<Control:40><Variable:140>で攻撃<Variable:240>）
Entry.EnglishText: <Color:340>Try it for yourself!<Color:40> - Press <Control:40> to attack. - Press <Icon:E06> + <Control:40> to attack.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Icon:406><Variable:140>での移動中にも<Control:40>で攻撃ができます この攻撃を敵に当てると<Variable:240>、<Variable:140>自動的に ターゲットがその敵に切り替わります
Entry.EnglishText: While using <Icon:406> to run around, you can press <Control:40> to perform a free-run attack. If the attack hits an enemy, your target will automatically switch to that opponent.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Color:340><Variable:140>練習してみましょう<Color:40> <Variable:240>（<Icon:406><Variable:140>の移動中に<Control:40>で攻撃<Variable:240>）
Entry.EnglishText: <Color:340>Try it for yourself!<Color:40> - While moving with <Icon:406>, press <Control:40> to perform a free-run attack.

Entry.JapaneseText: 【<Color:140><Variable:140>術技<Color:40><Variable:240>】
Entry.EnglishText: [<Color:140>Artes<Color:40>]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Control:140><Variable:140>ボタンで敵を攻撃しましょう 術技攻撃を行えます 攻撃の際<Variable:240>、<Variable:140>術技毎のＴＰを消費します
Entry.EnglishText: Using <Control:140> to attack an enemy will cause a special attack known as an arte to be performed. Performing an arte uses up TP.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Variable:140>技は通常攻撃<Control:40>の後に 続けて入力すると<Variable:240>、<Variable:140>連携できます
Entry.EnglishText: Artes can be combined by using them after regular attacks (<Control:40>).

Entry.JapaneseText: <Color:340><Variable:140>練習してみましょう<Color:40> <Variable:240>（<Control:140><Variable:140>で術技攻撃 <Variable:240> <Variable:140>通常攻撃<Control:40>の後に連携可能<Variable:240>）
Entry.EnglishText: <Color:340>Try it for yourself!<Color:40> - Press <Control:40> to perform a regular attack then press <Control:140> to perform an arte.

Entry.JapaneseText: 【<Color:140><Variable:140>ガード<Color:40><Variable:240>】
Entry.EnglishText: [<Color:140>Blocking<Color:40>]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Control:240><Variable:140>で敵の攻撃を防ぎましょう 押し続ける事で<Variable:240>、<Variable:140>ガードし続けます
Entry.EnglishText: Press <Control:240> to block an incoming attack. Hold it down to guard continuously.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Variable:140>ガード中に<Icon:A06>で<Variable:240>、 <Variable:140>マジックガードもできます
Entry.EnglishText: While guarding, press <Icon:A06> to perform a magic guard.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Variable:140>マジックガードは<Variable:240>、<Variable:140>通常のガードよりも 術のダメージを軽減できます
Entry.EnglishText: Magic guard reduces the damage taken by A. ATK by a greater amount than a normal guard.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Color:340><Variable:140>練習してみましょう<Color:40> <Variable:240>（<Control:240><Variable:140>でガード <Variable:240> <Control:240>＋<Icon:A06><Variable:140>でマジックガード<Variable:240>）
Entry.EnglishText: <Color:340>Try it for yourself!<Color:40> - Press <Control:240> to block. - Press <Control:240> + <Icon:A06> to perform a magic guard.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Variable:140>ガード中に<Icon:D06>を素早く２回入力し ステップ移動させましょう 素早く一定距離を移動できます
Entry.EnglishText: Press <Icon:D06> twice quickly while guarding (<Control:240>) to perform a quick-step, allowing you to cover ground fast.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Color:340><Variable:140>練習してみましょう<Color:40> <Variable:240>（<Variable:140>ガード中に<Icon:D06>を素早く２回でステップ<Variable:240>）
Entry.EnglishText: <Color:340>Try it for yourself!<Color:40> - Hold <Control:240> to block, then press <Icon:D06> twice quickly to quick-step.

Entry.JapaneseText: 【<Color:140><Variable:140>オーバーリミッツ<Color:40><Variable:240>】
Entry.EnglishText: [<Color:140>Over Limit<Color:40>]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Variable:140>攻撃を当てたり<Variable:240>、<Variable:140>受けたりすると ＯＶＬゲージが溜まります
Entry.EnglishText: Attacking and being attacked causes the OVL gauge to gradually fill.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Variable:140>ゲージが最大の状態の時に <Control:440>でオーバーリミッツが 発動できます
Entry.EnglishText: Once it has filled, you can press <Control:440> to activate your Over Limit.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Variable:140>発動中はゲージがなくなるまで さまざまな特殊効果が発生します
Entry.EnglishText: Special abilities will be granted while the gauge is active until the gauge runs out.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Variable:140>ただし<Variable:240>、<Variable:140>敵の攻撃を受けると ゲージが早く減少するので 注意して下さい
Entry.EnglishText: However, please keep in mind that the gauge will decrease quickly if you are attacked by an enemy!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Color:340><Variable:140>練習してみましょう<Color:40> <Variable:240>（<Control:440><Variable:140>でオーバーリミッツ<Variable:240>）
Entry.EnglishText: <Color:340>Try it for yourself!<Color:40> - Press <Control:440> to enter Over Limit.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Variable:140>戦闘チュートリアルは以上です
Entry.EnglishText: This concludes the battle basics tutorial.
